overview: A revival is coming to Sugar Creek, but the celebration may be in jeopardy in the third installment of the series based on Paul Hutchens's Christian adventure books. After a morning swim and a scuffle with some bullies, the gang learns about a plan that could spell disaster for the evening's big event. Now, it's up to Bill Collins, Dragonfly and the rest of the kids to find the truth before nightfall.
title: Sugar Creek Gang: Revival Villains
